page.title: 13CLUBS FOR ADULTS
page.content: There are numerous clubs and societies in Shrewton and Orcheston, many of which are supported generously by local residents and outsiders. Shrewton Silver Band is one such organisation. The village has had a brass band for many years, and each year they participate in fetes, carnivals and contests. They also organise fund-raising events such as jumble sales and giving concerts. The Womans Institute is also a thriving group in the village.The members enjoy competitions,sports tournaments, and listening to outside speakers on a variety of subjects. Many groups are involved in charitable projects helping less fortunate people in foreign countries, for example,Group '81 provide funds to educate a young child in Nepal.
